title: Configurable numRecordsToKeep for sync during recovery
description: During a replica reboot, a fullcopy is triggered if the number of updates is more than a constant 100 (UpdateLog.numRecordsToKeep).This feature adds a new property to the updatelog plugin to make it configurable

comments.author: Neelesh Shastry
